QuestData.Title: Defense At Niuzao Temple
QuestData.Description: Niuzao Temple, far to the west, is under attack by the mantid.$B$BThe great Celestial holds them back for now, but he cannot stand alone forever.$B$BGo and help the defenders, $c. The Temple must not fall!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Ogo the Elder at Niuzao Temple in the Townlong Steppes.
